headline.main: EU Office Estimates Almost $1 Billion in Graft Last Year
headline.print_headline: EU Office Estimates Almost $1 Billion in Graft Last Year

docs.snippet: The European Union's anti-fraud office said that almost $1 billion of the bloc's budget was lost to graft and irregularities last year....
docs.lead_paragraph: The European Union's anti-fraud office said that almost $1 billion of the bloc's budget was lost to graft and irregularities last year.

headline.main: Blues Sign Hitchcock to 1-Year Deal, Will Be His Last
headline.print_headline: Blues Sign Hitchcock to 1-Year Deal, Will Be His Last

docs.snippet: Ken Hitchcock has another one-year deal to coach the St. Louis Blues. The 64-year-old says this one will be his last....
docs.lead_paragraph: Ken Hitchcock has another one-year deal to coach the St. Louis Blues. The 64-year-old says this one will be his last.

headline.main: Trinity Broadcasting's Jan Crouch Dies Days After Stroke
headline.print_headline: Trinity Broadcasting's Jan Crouch Dies Days After Stroke

docs.snippet: Televangelist Jan Crouch, who co-founded the Trinity Broadcasting Network with her husband more than four decades ago, died Tuesday just days after she suffered a stroke, her family said on the network's website...
docs.lead_paragraph: Televangelist Jan Crouch, who co-founded the Trinity Broadcasting Network with her husband more than four decades ago, died Tuesday just days after she suffered a stroke, her family said on the network's website

headline.main: Kansas Teen Gets 16-Year Sentence in Sister's Stabbing Death
headline.print_headline: Kansas Teen Gets 16-Year Sentence in Sister's Stabbing Death

docs.snippet: A 16-year-old Kansas girl has been sentenced to nearly 16 years in prison in the fatal stabbing of her younger sister....
docs.lead_paragraph: A 16-year-old Kansas girl has been sentenced to nearly 16 years in prison in the fatal stabbing of her younger sister.

headline.main: After Brexit-Roadmap for a Leap in the Dark
headline.print_headline: After Brexit-Roadmap for a Leap in the Dark

docs.snippet: Dawn, Friday, June 24. The votes are in. The British have spoken in their EU membership referendum and they want out. It is a scenario European leaders are now planning for in earnest while praying it never happens....
docs.lead_paragraph: Dawn, Friday, June 24. The votes are in. The British have spoken in their EU membership referendum and they want out. It is a scenario European leaders are now planning for in earnest while praying it never happens.

headline.main: Death of Teenage Girl Casts Doubt on Egypt's Efforts to End FGM: Activists
headline.print_headline: Death of Teenage Girl Casts Doubt on Egypt's Efforts to End FGM: Activists

docs.snippet: The death of a teenage girl during an operation to illegally perform female genital mutilation (FGM) on her in Egypt raises questions about the north African nation's efforts to end the practice, anti-FGM campaigners said on Tuesday....
docs.lead_paragraph: The death of a teenage girl during an operation to illegally perform female genital mutilation (FGM) on her in Egypt raises questions about the north African nation's efforts to end the practice, anti-FGM campaigners said on Tuesday.

headline.main: Spain Name Uncapped Vazquez in Euro Squad
headline.print_headline: Spain Name Uncapped Vazquez in Euro Squad

docs.snippet: Spain coach Vicente del Bosque has included uncapped Real Madrid forward Lucas Vazquez in his 23-man squad for next month's European Championship in France....
docs.lead_paragraph: Spain coach Vicente del Bosque has included uncapped Real Madrid forward Lucas Vazquez in his 23-man squad for next month's European Championship in France.

headline.main: 'Shield' Actor Convicted of Murder in Killing of Wife
headline.print_headline: 'Shield' Actor Convicted of Murder in Killing of Wife

docs.snippet: A jury on Tuesday convicted an actor who played a police officer on TV of second-degree murder in the shooting death of his wife that was partially witnessed by their two young sons....
docs.lead_paragraph: A jury on Tuesday convicted an actor who played a police officer on TV of second-degree murder in the shooting death of his wife that was partially witnessed by their two young sons.

headline.main: NPR Ombudsman Has Issues With Funding by Pro-Iran Deal Group
headline.print_headline: NPR Ombudsman Has Issues With Funding by Pro-Iran Deal Group

docs.snippet: National Public Radio should consider avoiding grants such as one the Ploughshares Fund provided for coverage of the Iran nuclear agreement and related issues, the radio network's ombudsman said. The White House recently identified Ploughshares as...
docs.lead_paragraph: National Public Radio should consider avoiding grants such as one the Ploughshares Fund provided for coverage of the Iran nuclear agreement and related issues, the radio network's ombudsman said. The White House recently identified Ploughshares as a group that helped sell the multinational deal to a skeptical public.

docs.snippet: Maybe America actually likes Obama-type government?...
